roleset.name: carve, inscribe
roleset.note: ENGRAVE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'engrave' based on sentences in wsj. No access to verbnet at the moment. (from engrave.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: passive
example.text: One Colombian drug boss, upon hearing in 1987 that Gen. Noriega was negotiating with the U.S. to abandon his command for a comfortable exile, sent him [a hand-sized mahogany coffin]-1 engraved [*]-1 with his name.
